page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ....
page.content:
Richard Gerald Bartlett aged 13
6.45 Woken up by house orderlies. Queue up for bathroom and eventually wash and clean teeth (Colgate toothpaste 27p.) 7.00 Back to dormitory to get dressed into the school uniform of tweed jacket, black trousers, white shirt and house tie. 7.15 Watch breakfast T.V. (TV-am) 7.30 House meeting (boring and trivial matters concerning today !) 7.45 Catch the mini-bus to main school a mile down the road. 8.00 Breakfast of toast, baked beans (not Heinz though !) bacon, sausage, weatabix, and juice. 8.30 Chapel (enough said) 8.50 Morning lessons with breaktime at 10.50 - 11.20.
